name: Prototype R
description:
You play as a robot without a body whose goal is to escape the lab using your power to recall and warp. Inspired by a Flash game I played many years ago, called Focus.

Palette is pear36.

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Enter Warp mode / Warp

R - Enter Recall mode

E/W or Scroll Wheel - Hologram selection

Spacebar - Progress the dialogue

All coding, art, music, and sfx by @TheWinrawr.

UPDATE - If you're interested, here is a Windows version with an autosave system since there's a lot of levels.
